column4: What's the absolute best, most fail-free method of installing flash for x64 Ubuntu?
What's the best method of installing flash for x64 9.10?
HOW DO I INSTALL X64 FLASH.
last I checked the safest way was to download it from adobe's page ... aptitude will install the 32 bit version with a wrapper, but that hangs mozilla up all the time
adobe has a 64 bit version for download
it's in alpha, but works great
Last time I downloaded the .deb package it was just i386
that's why you have to download it from that URL, it's the labs, alpha software not yet released
err...what do I do with the .so file?
and create a symlink to usr/lib/firefox/plugins
I just moved it into plugins and it works perfectly. Thanks.
